property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{G}{U}: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are cautious with their body language and facial expressions. Any stray movement could betray the positions of the troops they protect and cost many lives.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying, first strike, and vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As his new wings lifted him high above Bant, Taric felt his earthly aspirations transform into heavenly resolve.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the meek charge into battle, courage becomes infectious.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Domain - Aven Trailblazer's toughness is equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bird wore the form of a man, bereft of filigree. Why do the Texts not speak of it?" - Belator of Esper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target black or red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This new chaos confounds us. We must fling it into our winds, our storms. These we can control." - Bezzit Plar, Esper stormcaller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mages of Esper measure their wealth and status by the number of servants in their retinues.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}: Darklit Gargoyle gets +2/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shines in the darkness of its master's ambitions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+2 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. Basic landcycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without a connection of mind and body, magic is just an idea stuck in the head, a word on the tip of a tongue.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A paragon of honor, Galo Aher fell to a blast of fire. The Order of the White Orchid was so saddened that they forged a new sigil in his likeness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their war forgotten, the nations of Bant stood united in the face of a common threat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue permanent, you may create a token that's a copy of Mirror-Sigil Sergeant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I had many lives, I would give them all for Bant."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {G}, {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must hunt and kill the dragon before it can return to raze our ancient city."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Paragon of the Amesha becomes an Angel, gets +3/+3, and gains flying and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let my lance sing with the voices of angels and the heathen cower before my shield, for I will teach this land the meaning of honor."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rhox Meditant enters the battlefield, if you control a green permanent, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The weight of her conviction balances on the harmony of her soul.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whether or not you will bow to me is not open to debate. The question is, will I ever let you rise?" - Fridius, telemin master

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the outsiders invaded Bant, soldiers who once saw sigils as the highest marks of glory began to see the scars of battle as tokens of equal worth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying At the beginning of your end step, you may gain life equal to the power of target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lives of elves are long, but their memories are longer. Even after death, they do not desert their homes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Brackwater Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Unearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Priests of Bant protect their temples with traps more elaborate than any mosaic floor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant red or green creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Togk Manytooth struggled helplessly as the kathari circled above him. For a warrior, immobilization is a fate worse than death.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The stone is more potent than ever. The flesh that creeps into our land will become even more slovenly and weak." - Niclavs, archmage of Esper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{W}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature or enchantment. {2}{U}: Untap Ethersworn Adjudicator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Esper mages devised their weapons to be so devastating that war seemed unnecessary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The battle was won in the commander's head before the first weapon was drawn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's simple, really. If they can't find us, they can't kill us."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Into its maw went the seventh sea, never to be seen again while the world remains." - Esper fable

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Parasitic Strix enters the battlefield, if you control a black permanent, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After finding no sustenance on the edges of Grixis, it turned to the skies of Bant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The road to truth has many branches, and so must the cane with which I walk it." - Voln the Elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{B}: Scornful Aether-Lich gains fear and vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap, and it can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With no flesh, there is no pain, no hesitation, no emotion of any kind. He is crafted perfection." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. That player puts all noncreature cards revealed this way into their graveyard, then you put the creature card onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Send it back to its own strange world so we can avoid another inglorious combat with these wicked beings." - Captain Valek of Jhess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. If you control a white permanent, return View from Above to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This air feels so heavy and thick. There are no winds to speak of. I fear the knowledge that comes from a place like this."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every horizon hides a new possibility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life. Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Forest or Plains Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bones of Jund's dead resurfaced in Naya, poisoning the jungle and killing the sunseeders' crops.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The barbarians of Jund believe the bottomless tar pits extend forever into other, darker worlds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}{R}: Dreadwing gets +3/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dreadwings spring from lofty perches to surprise kathari in midflight. They smother their prey and then consume it as they glide gently toward the ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player mill two cards. Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Fleshformer gets +2/+2 and gains fear until end of turn. Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn. (A creature with fear can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Necromancers who discovered the new sources of mana were quick to dream up new nightmares with them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Grixis Slavedriver leaves the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, if you control a red permanent, you may have Kederekt Parasite deal 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the smell of passing thoughts piques its hunger, its maw becomes primed with acid and a taste for brains.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Nyxathid enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Nyxathid gets -1/-1 for each card in the chosen player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born of volcanic forces, it thrives on the absolute panic it inspires.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) {2}{R}: Pestilent Kathari gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rotting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card. Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Salvage Slasher gets +1/+0 for each artifact card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Esper artificers never imagined that one day their scraps would be pressed against their soft and fragile throats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One goes to Tidehollow either to forget or to be forgotten. Either way, the scullers will oblige.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sedraxis Alchemist enters the battlefield, if you control a blue permanent, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The problem with a liquid that can dissolve anything is finding something to carry it in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Target player discards a card for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Grixis collided with the rest of Alara, the worlds began to hear the hateful whispers of the forgotten dead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature if it has the least power or is tied for least power among creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The meek inherit nothing." - Sedris, the Traitor King

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When a creature dies, destroy enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The demon's yoke is part leash, part noose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banefire deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A drop of blood spilled from the first dragon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Jund, the deep canyons were the best places to hide. When the goblins wandered into Naya, they found that was not so true.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dark Temper deals 2 damage to target creature. If you control a black permanent, destroy the creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you've got the temperament of a dragon, every argument is one you'll win.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Dragonsoul Knight becomes a Dragon, gets +5/+3, and gains flying and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The farther he roamed from Jund and its dragons, the more he felt their essence in himself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin Razerunners. At the beginning of your end step, you may have Goblin Razerunners deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Finding themselves in a new and unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ignite Disorder deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target white and/or blue creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bant is a world imprisoned by polished stone and tyrannical rule. It yearns to strike back against those who restrain it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}: Kranioceros gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A surly beast, the kranioceros will raise its defenses at the smallest threat. Stay out of sight and downwind, or you'll disrupt its natural migrations." - Ebrel, godtoucher mentor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spikes of sangrite made the goblin stronger, but they didn't make him any smarter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact creature. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The metal filigree in his body glowed red-hot, and his flesh soon followed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Quenchable Fire deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. It deals an additional 3 damage to that player or planeswalker at the beginning of your next upkeep step unless that player or that planeswalker's controller pays {U} before that step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You'd better know how to pray for rain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {R}, {T}: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The finest pawns are those with pawns of their own." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Toxic Iguanar has deathtouch as long as you control a green permanent. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are no "weak" creatures on Jund. Even the smallest can strike a deadly blow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike {B}{G}: Viashino Slaughtermaster gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll fight two at once, and then lick their guts from my blades."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can we outrun the sky?" - Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.) When Voracious Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to twice the number of Goblins it devoured.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - {3}: Wandering Goblins gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tired of waiting for a dragon to eat them, some hardy goblins struck out to become meals for the unknown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You may cast Worldheart Phoenix from your graveyard by paying {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than paying its mana cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When its smoky plumes light Naya's sky, every creature from the smallest pip fawn to the largest rannet heeds the warning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cliffrunner Behemoth has haste as long as you control a red permanent. Cliffrunner Behemoth has lifelink as long as you control a white permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's revered for its power, celebrated for its grace, and feared for the avalanches triggered by its thunderous feet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}{G}{W}: Cylian Sunsinger and each other creature with the same name as it get +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sun shines bright upon the strong."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky." - Sunseeder myth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If that permanent was blue or black, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sphinx tyrannized Bant until a rhox mage tested the hardiness of her shiny parts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Jund, everything eventually ends up in something else's stomach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Matca Rioters's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When outsiders interrupted the matca championship, things got ugly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The combined strength of all five planes spawned creations none had seen before.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blades dull and armor dents. Marisi taught us that instinct is the only thing a true warrior needs." - Ajani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She protects the sacred groves from blight, drought, and the Unbeholden.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gods do not sleep soundly in the earth's embrace." - Mayael the Anima

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}{W}, {T}: Sacellum Archers deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our arrows are aimed not at the sacred behemoths but at those who dare to dream of such a trophy."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Scattershot Archer deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To train her elves for war, Mayael would drop a sackful of acorns from the tree canopy. Each archer tried to split as many as possible before the acorns hit the forest floor below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a Plains card, an Island card, a Swamp card, and a Mountain card. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An avatar he sculpts of wisdom and strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seeds from Jund don't drift gently on the wind. They get up and stampede.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Thornling gains haste until end of turn. {G}: Thornling gains trample until end of turn. {G}: Thornling gains indestructible until end of turn. {1}: Thornling gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: Thornling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tukatongue Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund's thallids tried to disguise their deliciousness by covering themselves in spines harvested from the tukatongue tree.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Wild Leotau unless you pay {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leotau that were born wild make the best mounts. It's like riding a thunderstorm." - Rafiq of the Many

property.name: Rules
property.value: Apocalypse Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, it enters the battlefield with an additional X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Apocalypse Hydra: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, each player loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Tyrant for each 1 life lost this way. Whenever a player loses the game, put five +1/+1 counters on Blood Tyrant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Charnelhoard Wurm deals damage to an opponent, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund's dragons hoard only sangrite crystals. Its wurms aren't so picky.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Child of Alara dies, destroy all nonland permanents. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The progeny of the Maelstrom shows no allegiance - and no mercy - to any of the five shards.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of world-bending machinations, Bolas's triumph is at hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each of the twenty-three winds of Esper is named and chronicled, and every possible interaction with the flow of magic is exhaustively detailed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, that player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Taste his power, hunger for his command.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The smiths of this land must be mad to reach so far and so high for another creature to decorate." - Cagen Vargan, Jhessian sea scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Exploding Borders deals X damage to target player or planeswalker, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Reuniting a world is not a gentle process.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the shards merged into the Maelstrom, their mana energies fused into new monstrosities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Destroy target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To trespass so far from home is to ask for a lonesome grave."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Egbol stared in wonder at Naya's landscape. So much to eat. So much to steal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{U}, {T}: Put a bribery counter on target creature you don't control. Its controller draws a card. Creatures with bribery counters on them can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.) Hellkite Hatchling has flying and trample if it devoured a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have two choices: heed my advice now or need my healing later."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge of Bant's landscape and ruins is a weapon that the invaders can't comprehend." - Elspeth

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves of Naya were the last to acknowledge the massive shift of mana in their world.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Maelstrom Archangel deals combat damage to a player, you may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no world where angels fear to tread.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Magister Sphinx enters the battlefield, target player's life total becomes 10.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These benighted worlds are thick with ignorance. I will educate them. They will listen, or they will die."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, trample Whenever Meglonoth blocks a creature, Meglonoth deals damage to that creature's controller equal to Meglonoth's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the shards merged, Mayael found herself the general of Naya's mightiest army.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Survival in the wilds of Naya left Tiyan well equipped to win the civilized battles of Bant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+3]: Destroy target noncreature permanent. −2: Gain control of target creature. −9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from everything If Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Soul of the World has returned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Rhox Bodyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An enlightened soul caged in a body made for battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Scarland Thrinax.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is only one way of life in Jund: feed on the weak until you are cut down by something stronger." - Jorshu of Clan Nel Toth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shambling Remains can't block. Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They lament the doom that is coming to Bant without realizing the part their own leaders have played in it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another artifact you control enters or leaves the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Underneath the cities of Esper are cycles of life unseen by those who feed them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sphinx Summoner enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand. then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Suicidal Charge: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Those creatures attack this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They think they're winning. But they're just lining up to be dinner." - Rakka Mar

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Regenerate target creature with power 5 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plowbeasts of Naya escaped their harnesses in droves, content to snack on the conveniently cultivated fields of Eos and Valeron.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of honing her philosophy in debate with stubborn rhoxes, Niella was ready to convert any heathen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}{B}: Vectis Agents gets -2/-0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With their life energy suppressed under their etherium enhancements, thieves from Esper found it surprisingly easy to explore the ruins of Grixis.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Seekers of Carmot searched across the unknown lands for the mystical red stone that could reforge Esper in ethereal perfection.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ripe smell of life drifted into Grixis. The dead caught the scent and with reckless hunger followed it back into Jund.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages - until now.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a world where death is always violent, cruel weapons are as common as rocks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws two additional cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who drink from Malfegor's cup are tainted with hunger and stained with lies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kaleidostone enters the battlefield, draw a card. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Kaleidostone: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once broken, who knows what worlds might grow from its shards?

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who dismiss the cylix as an ordinary wooden bowl are blind to the true measure of its worth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the shards merged, relics once thought mundane regained forgotten powers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, {T}: You gain 5 life. {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {1}{R}, {T}: Obelisk of Alara deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Built in honor of Alara's creatures, the ziggurat vanished long ago. When Progenitus awakened, the temple emerged again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them." - Pulan, Bant orchardist

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the aven scouts located the tower in Esper, the Knights of the Reliquary set off on a righteous crusade to recover their lost treasures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped. When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins went to sleep in Jund and awoke in Grixis. They'd never seen a zombie before. They would never see one again.
